## InferFlexibleExtension type

Get the extension from a PrioritizedExtension.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type InferFlexibleExtension<GFlexible extends FlexibleExtension<any>> = GFlexible extends PrioritizedExtension<any> ? GFlexible['extension'] : GFlexible extends AnyExtension ? GFlexible : never;
```
